game.intro: Welcome to the world of Trogld. Treasures and riches await you...if you survive!

row.cell: You find yourself in the corner of a dark, dank cell. You can't see very well and the room is quiet.
You are in anther corner of the cell. You see a bleached skeleton against the wall, covered in ripped rags. You smell sulfer in the air.
The floor in this corner of the cell is slimey. You slip while trying to examine the floor. Luckily, you don't seem to get hurt. You smell sulfer in the air.
The smell of sulfer is overpowering now! You bumble your way into this corner of the cell to find a large, black dragon!
